questions.question: Why was swords ineffective against Grendel?

choices.answer: Swords were too dull
The swords weren't magical
His hide protected him
He casted a spell to protect him against swords
He beat him in terms of strength
He overpowered him and killed him
He fought fiercer than Grendel
He tore his arm off, forcing him to run

questions.question: Where did Grendel emerge from at the beginning?

choices.answer: Out from the Marsh
From the Mountains
From the Beachhead
From the Swamp

choices.answer: Battering blows
Fire
Hurricanes

questions.question: What surprised Grendel when he was eating people?

choices.answer: One of the people tasted weird

Beowulf's strength upon grabbing him

questions.question: Why do you think Grendel's approach to the great hall differed from when he first came

choices.answer: He was confident that there was food there
He became more accustomed to coming to visit the Great Hall
He knew that there would be no resistance
He knew that he was stronger than them

choices.answer: Set up a trap for Grendel
Set up a night shift to guard the great hall

Confront him at full force

choices.answer: She wanted vengeance for her son
